special_text:
[+2]: Mill three cards. You may put all land cards milled this way onto the battlefield tapped.
[-2]: [b][Return target non-Korra permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.][/b]
[-3]: Create Goggles, a legendary 5/5 green Elemental Dragon creature token with trample, reach and “Whenever a land you control enters, up to one target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.”
Flash paradigm {G}{G} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
